name: Cloudian - Turbulence
effectText: Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it. If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 1 Fog Counter on it for each "Cloudian" monster on the field. You can remove 1 Fog Counter from this card; Special Summon 1 "Cloudian - Smoke Ball" from your Deck or either GY.
